ginplugin.name: Filesystem Content Provider
ginplugin.description: This ContentProvider plugin is able to scan the filesystem for files matching the filter-pattern are transformed into Content objects which are provided to the iQser GIN Server.

params.param: Folder from where the files are read.
One or more file extension ins brackets; e.g. [pdf][doc][docx][xls][xlsx][ppt][pptx][txt]
If set, only these sub-folders are taken in consideration.
If set, these sub-folders are excluded from processing.
Provide here the names of the attribute which are handled as "keys" by the platform; e.g. [FILENAME][NAME][Title][Category][Keywords][AUTHOR][subject]
Attribute mappings in json format: "{attr1:new_attr1,attr2:new_attr2}"; e.g. {title:NAME}
